subject: Attention:Benefivery,
body:
Attention:Benefivery,
FUND RELEASE PAYMENT APPROVED US$30.5MiILLON UNITED STATES DOLLARS
This is urgent message to you kindly been inform that the president of america,Mr.Joe Biden,is now have concluded approved release of your abandon FUND US30.5M for immediate your FUND,
 be release to you this new year 2024 January so because of delay if you are the one been the real beneficiary of this FUND Do not be delay and kindly send your address details information requested below  was i received your details i will proceed ON how you are going to be receive  your FUND,
Your Full Name
Your Country
Your Age
Your telephone number
Copy Of your ID Card passport
Your Occupation
Regards,
Mr.Thomas Rosel
U.S Government
Treasury Department

subject: Re:   Attention:Benefivery,
body:
Hello Rosel,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised and excited about this news! Could you please tell me more about how this came to be? How was my name chosen for this fund release?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Cameron

subject: Re: Attention:Benefivery,Cameron,Kindly Response
body:
Attention:Cameron,

Thank you for your response to my email, i need to been kindly inform you
that this is NOT a scam will are here U.S Government Treasury Department to
be RELEASED your FUND US$30.5M,

 because your name has been listed  among the (5)beneficiary so because of
delay you have to been kindly send your bank account details information
including your home address details requested BELOW, send it to us so that
will can proceed where your FUND been deposited in your name has you are
the benefivery and find attach copy of my working ID Card has been attach
to this email,

Your Full Name
Your Country
Your Age
Your telephone number
Copy Of your ID Card passport
Your Occupation
Regards,
Mr.Thomas Rosel
U.S Government
Treasury Department

subject: Re: Attention:Benefivery,Cameron,Kindly Response
body:
Hello Rosel,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear that my name has been listed by the Government Treasury Department. I'm curious, how did my name come up? 

Also, could you please explain a bit more about this fund? How much is it and why is it being released to me?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Cameron
